==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しん|ごう|む|し|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|信号|無視|tr1=shingō|gloss1=traffic signal|tr2=mushi|gloss2=disregard|lang=ja}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しんごうむし}}

# The act of crossing or entering an [[intersection]] ignoring a [[traffic signal]] (on foot or with a vehicle); [[jaywalking]].
# One who [[run]]s a [[red light]] or [[stop sign]].

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|しんごうむし}}

# To cross or enter an [[intersection]] ignoring a [[traffic signal]] (on foot or with a vehicle); [[jaywalk]].
# To [[pass]] a [[red light]] or [[stop sign]] without [[stop]]ping.

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|しんごうむし}}

====Usage notes====
* This term can be used to describe the act of both people and vehicles.
